text: Nihsansaya, je loka allahasi kelela vacana-karara ani apalya sapathanna thodyasa kimmativara vikuna takatata tyancyasathi akhiratamadhye kahica his'sa nahi. Sarvasrestha allaha na tara tyancyasi sambhasana karila, na kiyamatacya divasi tyancyakade pahila, na tyanna paka (pavitra) karila, ani tyancyasathi motha duhkhadayaka azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe
